org.corfudb.runtime.view

Interface IStreamAddressSpace

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StreamAddressSpace

    public interface IStreamAddressSpace
    A stream address space is a write-once address space which is fully stream-aware. Entries in a stream address space contain: 1) A set of streams which the entry belongs to 2) A set of hints present when the entry was retrieved 3) The payload, as a byte buffer. Created by mwei on 8/26/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressEntryCode 
      static class  IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry<T>
      This class represents an entry in a stream address space.
      static class  IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressWriteResult

    • Method Detail

      • writeAsync

        CompletableFuture<IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressWriteResult> writeAsync(long offset,
                                                                           Set<UUID> streams,
                                                                           Object payload)
        Asynchronously write to the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to write to.
        streams - The streams that this entry will belong to.
        payload - The unserialized payload that belongs to this entry.

      • readAsync

        CompletableFuture<IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry> readAsync(long offset)
        Asynchronously read from the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to read from.
        Returns:
        A StreamAddressSpaceEntry containing the data that was read.

      • write

        default IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressWriteResult write(long offset,
                                                           Set<UUID> streams,
                                                           Object payload)
        Write to the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to write to.
        streams - The streams that this entry will belong to.
        payload - The preserialized payload that belongs to this entry.

      • fillHole

        void fillHole(long offset)
        Fill an address in the address space with a hole entry. This method is unreliable (not guaranteed to send a request to any log unit) and asynchronous.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to fill.

      • read

        default IStreamAddressSpace.StreamAddressSpaceEntry read(long offset)
        Read from the stream address space.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset (global index) to read from.
        Returns:
        A StreamAddressSpaceEntry which represents this entry, or null, if there is no entry at this space.
        Throws:
        TrimmedException - If the index has been previously written to and is now released for garbage collection.

      • trim

        void trim(UUID stream,
          long prefix)
        Trim a prefix of a stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - The ID of the stream to be trimmed.
        prefix - The prefix to be trimmed, inclusive.

      • resetCaches

        void resetCaches()
        Reset all caches.
